import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Repositories Blame Authors</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/api/v2/git/blameAuthors"}></MethodEndpoint>



Get list of repositories authors

| Name             | Required            | Type          | In   | Description                                                                     |
|------------------|---------------------|---------------|------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| repositories     | no - default all user permitted repositories   | array<string\>  | body  | array of repositories to get git blame authors for |
| search           | no                                             | string         | query | repositories to filter by                          |
| page             | no                                             | number         | query | pagination page number                             |
| pageSize         | no                                             | number         | query | limit query results                                |

Request Example 1:
```json
 { "repositories": ["prismacloudcas/terragoat", "prismacloudcas/checkov"] }
```
Response Example 1:
```json
[
    { "data": ["yoni", "yehuda"], hasNext: false }
]
```


Request Example 2:
```json
 { "search": "prismacloudcas/terragoat", "page": 0, "pageSize": 100  }
```
Response Example 2:
```json
[
     { "data": ["yoni", "yehuda"], hasNext: false }
]
```

## Request

array of author names

Could not get git blame authors, check POST query params

</div><div></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"422"} value={"422"}><div>

</div><div></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"500"} value={"500"}><div>
